components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Outbound SMS Delivery Delays to America Net Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing outbound SMS delivery delays when sending messages to America Net Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing outbound SMS delivery delays when sending messages to America Net Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with outbound SMS delivery delays to America Net Network in Brazil. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Meta Template Approval Webhook Delivery Failure

incident_updates.body: There is currently a bug in Meta's systems that is causing a delay in template status change event delivery. There will be a delay for the time it takes for a template approval to be reflected in Twilio's systems. Customers may see a discrepancy in the template status between Meta and Twilio during this delay. Twilio will continue to monitor the situation while Meta resolves the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 10 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
16 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 17 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
23 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 24 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
30 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, April 19th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.
